verbs.description: A Kim Jong Un impersonator [V: was] spotted in Singapore ahead of a possible summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and the North Korean leader .
[ARG1: A Kim Jong Un impersonator] was [V: spotted] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: ahead of a possible summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and the North Korean leader] .
